name: Voice Memo Widget Playground
description:
Record and share audio notes for teammates with the voice memo widget. Provide feedback that’s hard to capture on a sticky, asynchronous updates, or a quick message to let someone know they’re doing a great job.


This playground is designed to help you get started with the widget.



This widget is licensed under Figma’s Terms of Service, unless you have a different agreement with us for Figma Services.
